title: Your Shop displays different skins
body: I wanted to buy a skin out of the My Shop thing that lasts until october but when i opend it again there were completley different skins in the shop then the last i looked ! I really wanted to get the Traditional Trundle but it doesnt show now ! Are the skins in the shop limited to a time or why do i have different skins in there now ?

replies.body: No worries! Reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our EU agents will be able to confirm what offers you had and first and make that purchase happen still!
